verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH5315> 'If anyone sins<WH2398> unintentionally,<WH7684> in any of the things which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH4687> not to be done,<WH6213> and does<WH6213> any<WH259> one of them:<WH2007>

He shall bring<WH935> the bull<WH6499> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> and he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bull,<WH6499> and kill<WH7819> the bull<WH6499> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
The anointed<WH4899> priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> some of the blood<WH1818> of the bull,<WH6499> and bring<WH935> it to the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

The priest<WH3548> shall put<WH5414> some of the blood<WH1818> on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> which is in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting;<WH4150> and he shall pour<WH8210> out all of rest of the blood<WH1818> of the bull<WH6499> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering,<WH5930> which is at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

He shall take all the fat<WH2459> of the bull<WH6499> of the sin offering<WH2403> off<WH7311> of it;<WH2459> the fat that covers<WH3680> the innards,<WH7130> and all the fat<WH2459> that is on the innards,<WH7130>

and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them,<WH3689> which is by the loins, and the cover<WH3508> on the liver,<WH3516> with the kidneys,<WH3629> he shall take away,<WH5493>
as it is taken off<WH7311> of the bull<WH7794> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings.<WH8002> The priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them on the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering.<WH5930>
The bull<WH6499>'s skin,<WH5785> all its flesh,<WH1320> with its head,<WH7218> and with its legs,<WH3767> its innards,<WH7130> and its dung,<WH6569>

even the whole bull<WH6499> shall he carry forth<WH3318> outside<WH2351> the camp<WH4264> to a clean<WH2889> place,<WH4725> where the ashes<WH1880> are poured out,<WH8211> and burn<WH8313> it on wood<WH6086> with fire.<WH784> Where<WH413> the ashes<WH1880> are poured out<WH8211> it shall be burned.<WH8313>

<WH5712>"'If the whole congregation of Israel<WH3478> sins,<WH7686> and the thing<WH1697> is hidden<WH5956> from the eyes<WH5869> of the assembly,<WH6951> and they have done<WH6213> any<WH259> of the things which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH4687> not to be done,<WH6213> and are guilty;<WH816>

The elders<WH2205> of the congregation<WH5712> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bull<WH6499> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> and the bull<WH6499> shall be killed<WH7819> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
The anointed<WH4899> priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH935> of the blood<WH1818> of the bull<WH6499> to the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150>
and the priest<WH3548> shall dip<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in the blood,<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH5137> it seven<WH7651> times<WH6471> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> before<WH6440> the veil.<WH6532>

He shall put<WH5414> some of the blood<WH1818> on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> which is before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> that is in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting;<WH4150> and the rest of the blood<WH1818> he shall pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering,<WH5930> which is at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
All its fat<WH2459> he shall take<WH7311> from it,<WH6999> and burn it on the altar.<WH4196>

Thus shall he do<WH6213> with the bull;<WH6499> as he did<WH6213> with the bull<WH6499> of the sin offering,<WH2403> so shall he do<WH6213> with this;<WH3548> and the priest shall make atonement<WH3722> for them,<WH5545> and they shall be forgiven.

He shall carry forth<WH3318> the bull<WH6499> outside<WH2351> the camp,<WH4264> and burn<WH8313> it as he burned<WH8313> the first<WH7223> bull.<WH6499> It is the sin offering<WH2403> for the assembly.<WH6951>

<WH5387>"'When a ruler sins,<WH2398> and unwittingly<WH7684> does<WH6213> any<WH259> one of all the things which Yahweh<WH3068> his God<WH430> has commanded<WH4687> not to be done,<WH6213> and is guilty;<WH816>
if his sin,<WH2403> in which he has sinned,<WH2398> is made known<WH3045> to him,<WH935> he shall bring as his offering<WH7133> a<WH8163> goat,<WH8163> a male<WH2145> without blemish.<WH8549>

He shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the goat,<WH8163> and kill<WH7819> it in the place<WH4725> where they kill<WH7819> the burnt offering<WH5930> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> It is a sin offering.<WH5930>

The priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> some of the blood<WH1818> of the sin offering<WH2403> with his finger,<WH676> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering.<WH5930> He shall pour out<WH8210> the rest of its blood<WH1818> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering.<WH5930>

All its fat<WH2459> he shall burn<WH6999> on the altar,<WH4196> like the fat<WH2459> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings;<WH8002> and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him concerning his sin,<WH2403> and he will be forgiven.<WH5545>

<WH259>"'If anyone<WH259> of the common<WH776> people<WH5971> sins<WH2398> unwittingly,<WH7684> in doing<WH6213> any<WH259> of the things which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH4687> not to be done,<WH6213> and is guilty;<WH816>

if his sin,<WH2403> which he has sinned,<WH2398> is made known<WH3045> to him,<WH935> then he shall bring for his offering<WH7133> a<WH8166> goat,<WH8166> a female<WH5347> without blemish,<WH8549> for his sin<WH2403> which he has sinned.<WH2398>
He shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the sin offering,<WH2403> and kill<WH7819> the sin offering<WH2403> in the place<WH4725> of burnt offering.<WH2403>

The priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> some of its blood<WH1818> with his finger,<WH676> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering;<WH5930> and the rest of its blood<WH1818> he shall pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar.<WH4196>

All its fat<WH2459> he shall take away,<WH5493> like the fat<WH2459> is taken away<WH5493> from off of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings;<WH8002> and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar<WH4196> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh;<WH3068> and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him,<WH5545> and he will be forgiven.
<WH935>"'If he brings a lamb<WH3532> as his offering for a sin<WH2403> offering,<WH7133> he shall bring<WH935> a female<WH5347> without blemish.<WH8549>

He shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the sin offering,<WH2403> and kill<WH7819> it for a sin offering<WH2403> in the place<WH4725> where they kill<WH7819> the burnt offering.<WH5930>

The priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> some of the blood<WH1818> of the sin offering<WH2403> with his finger,<WH676> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering;<WH5930> and all the rest of its blood<WH1818> he shall pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar.<WH4196>

All its fat<WH2459> he shall take away,<WH5493> like the fat<WH2459> of the lamb<WH3775> is taken away<WH5493> from the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings;<WH8002> and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them on the altar,<WH4196> on the offerings of Yahweh<WH3068> made by fire;<WH801> and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him concerning his sin<WH2403> that he has sinned,<WH2398> and he will be forgiven.<WH5545>
